overview: Steele Your Heart is a trilogy of relationships between dogs, technology and the environment. It questions who we are and where we are going, as individuals and as a human race. It touches upon the existence of time and how we measure it. How time and existence go on after death through memories. Memories, reflecting the playback mechanisms in our mind, which reflect how technology has taken over our memories through todays playback systems, photos, video, books, etc...
title: Steele Your Heart
